Name: Water Bodies
Description: At least 60% of area is covered by permanent water bodies.

Name: Evergreen Needleleaf Trees
Description: Dominated by evergreen conifer trees (>2m). Tree cover >10%.

Name: Evergreen Broadleaf Trees
Description: Dominated by evergreen broadleaf and palmate trees (>2m). Tree cover >10%.

Name: Deciduous Needleleaf Trees
Description: Dominated by deciduous needleleaf (larch) trees (>2m). Tree cover >10%.

Name: Deciduous Broadleaf Trees
Description: Dominated by deciduous broadleaf trees (>2m). Tree cover >10%.

Name: Grass
Description: Dominated by herbaceous annuals (<2m) that are not cultivated.

Name: Cereal Croplands
Description: Dominated by herbaceous annuals (<2m). At least 60% cultivated cereal crops.

Name: Broadleaf Croplands
Description: Dominated by herbaceous annuals (<2m). At least 60% cultivated broadleaf crops.

Name: Urban and Built-up Lands
Description: At least 30% impervious surface area including building materials, asphalt, and vehicles.

Name: Permanent Snow and Ice
Description: At least 60% of area is covered by snow and ice for at least 10 months of the year.

Name: Barren
Description: At least 60% of area is non-vegetated barren (sand, rock, soil) with less than 10% vegetation.

Name: Unclassified
Description: Has not received a map label because of missing inputs.
